name: Jerry B. Wells, PL
tag_list: orlando-real-estate-attorneys, orlando-real-estate-lawyers, orlando-real-estate-attorney, daytona-car-accident-attorney, ocala-motorcycle-accident-attorney, orlando-real-estate-lawyer, orlando-probate-lawyer, ocala-motorcycle-accident-lawyer, orlando-prob
overview:
“Legal matters can be frightening, stressful experiences. It is not always easy to ask Orlando probate law firms for help, but if you reside in Florida, you may find yourself faced with a complicated legal issue such as the following:

Wills undergoing probate in Ocala
A Daytona Beach will dispute
A question in Orlando regarding legal & fliving wills

At such times you need to find competent legal representation from an experienced will and probate law firm. When you need such an attorney, then you need Jerry B. Wells, Attorney and Counselor at Law. He can help you with matters involving:

Florida wills, probate, and trust administration
Florida real estate closings
Florida personal injury
Residential and commercial real estate in Florida

”
